commentary:
a) She bestowed boons (vara) upon Indra, the Lord of Heaven, and thereby blessed him.Indra also means speech. It should therefore be understood that She grants purity of speech (vak shuddhi) to those who focus on the Anahata chakra and worship.

b) Prahlada is known by the name Mahaveera. As She blessed him and granted him boons She is addressed as Mahaveerendra varada.
